metadata.title: CVE-2015-0842 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
[SQL injection issues (potential auth bypass)]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0842` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

yubiserver - 0.6-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: yubiserver package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6-3').
